review: Aciphex (rabeprazole):Severe stomach pain. After 3 days had to stop the medication.

I tried a number of over the counter medicines and Prevacid, but found no relief. After my 4th EGD I was prescribe Aciphex 20 mg 2 times a day. It worked. I can swallow, eat anything, and rarely get heart burn. I've been on it now for nearly 8 years.
I have taken generic rabeprazole for 3 yrs. It works great, before I couldn't eat a meal without choking.

Aciphex (rabeprazole):Was relieved to see that someone else has used this drug even longer than I have. I've been on it for 9 years with erosive esophagitis. I've rarely had any symtoms and can eat anything. I haven't been able to find any studies of long time use.

Aciphex (rabeprazole):In my experience Aciphex proved far superior to the generic brand I was given. I don't know the technical difference, but  Aciphex (taken once in AM & once in PM) alleviated the painful burnings in my stomach and up to my throat within a few days. The generic form seemed not to work as well or quickly and I suspected as a possible cause of simultaneous depression (which may or may not have been related...)

Aciphex (rabeprazole):I was on other proton pump inhibitors but had a constant headache while using them. Aciphex relieves my symptoms with no percieved side effects. Great drug and I've been on it for over 10 years. I have no evidence of further esophageal erosion and have been diagnosed by biopsy of having Barrett's esophagus. I can eat anything now.
Aciphex (rabeprazole):This Rx helped me immediately.  Have only used for one week but I was amazed!
